title: Still no Skin for my RP purchased Rune Pages
body: When are these supposed to be released? My wife and I put $50 each into the game and bought 7 rune page pack. We would not have made that purchase had Riot not announced that this would lead to free skins at a rate of 1 per 4 pages (rounded up). Neither of us received the skins. Is this supposed to happen with patch 8.1? or when?

replies.body:
The [**Preseason FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ) that talked about those rune page bonus skins you'd be getting mentioned the cutoff date of Sept 1st. Only rune pages bought with RP before that date qualified for those bonus mystery skins.

https://i.gyazo.com/2436c8f9febfc08f8ac2813a51d8ccf1.png
They said that they would give it out to all people who purchased pages BEFORE that announcement
